thread.title: Major League Baseball Steps Gingerly to Speed Up Games

author: Jared Diamond
title: Major League Baseball Steps Gingerly to Speed Up Games
text:
For months, Major League Baseball Commissioner Rob Manfred made it clear new rules to speed up the game would be in place by the start of the 2018 season. The question was just how extensive the changes would be.
With the average contest lasting a record 3 hours, 8 minutes last season, Manfred wanted to add a countdown timer between pitches, a controversial approach currently limited to the minors.
